arts.ttl: Report: Bristol City close gap to top six as Reds start 2025 in BS3 with win vs Derby County
arts.sum: Within two minutes, the Reds were ahead as McNally timed his run perfectly to connect with a wide Twine free-kick, converting a half-volley past Jacob Widell Zetterström in the Derby goal. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes candid Derby County admission after Bristol City defeat
arts.sum: Derby, who were without Ebou Adams due to concussion, are now four points above the Championship drop zone and speaking after the game, Warne said: "I didn't think we were anywhere near our best today. Paul Warne felt Derby County's defeat at Bristol City was a "game too far" for his players as Luke McNally's goal proved the difference at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Bristol City as star man shows quality as scores range from 2 to 8 - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Luke McNally's first-half goal ensured Derby County's troubling away form continued as Bristol City secured a narrow 1-0 victory at Ashton Gate. But just as Paul Warne's side were building some momentum, Derby fell behind when McNally got the better of Kane Wilson at the back post to volley a free-kick beyond Jacob Widell Zetterstrom.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Derby County: McNally goal secures first win of 2025 for Robins
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. Some good moments with the ball at his feet as well as he secured a third home clean sheet in as many matches.

arts.ttl: Luke McNally strike enough for Bristol City to sink Derby
arts.sum: Scott Twine’s chipped free-kick into the penalty area was volleyed home from close range by the centre-back.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Derby County as Liam Manning's Reds aim for first win of 2025
arts.sum: The Robins have managed to win two of their three games between Christmas and New Year's Day. While that represents a positive upturn in form, Liam Manning's side will be disappointed to not have come away with a 100 per cent record having let a lead slip twice in their 2-2 draw with Plymouth Argyle last time out. After a couple of weeks of fixture chaos, the curtain will finally be pulled on the festive period of the football season after Bristol City's clash with Derby County this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Bristol City confirm Rob Atkinson exit as defender completes loan switch to Championship club
arts.sum: Bristol City have confirmed their first departure of the January transfer window with centre-back Rob Atkinson leaving Ashton Gate to join Portsmouth on loan for the rest of the season. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Cam Pring, Mark Sykes, Sinclair Armstrong: Bristol City team news ahead of Derby County clash
arts.sum: Liam Manning has confirmed that Cam Pring suffered a hamstring injury during Bristol City's draw with Plymouth Argyle ahead of the Robins' clash with Derby County this weekend. With only two days to recover before Paul Warne's Derby side make the trip to Ashton Gate on Saturday, it seems unlikely that Pring will be fit to feature, with Manning admitting that he was "pretty sure" Haydon Roberts would get a chance to impress.

arts.ttl: ‘Should be confident’ – Bristol City vs Derby County prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Bristol City vs Derby County prediction ahead of the Championship clash on Saturday. The post ‘Should be confident’ – Bristol City vs Derby County prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes Derby County exit admission as Rams set for January departures
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Paul Warne admits Conor Washington could be among the "few players" who are set to leave Derby County his month.
